name: Grandad Ota - Introduction game
description:
Grandad Ota is a lovable old gentleman living in a care home in Niihama. His grandson loves visiting him and hearing stories of his youth, however unbelievable. Each story concerns a real location in Niihama, and after each tale concludes true information about each place is introduced.

I created this series of games as a fun way to introduce a relatively unknown city in Japan to the world, and potentially improve tourism to the town.

Stories are written in both English and Japanese
